Promoting Your OnlyFans on YouTube: 9 Proven Ways

Did you know that 53.9% of YouTube’s audience comprises of men?

Restrictions on OnlyFans: Ways to Make Money on OnlyFans While Staying within the Rules

Estimated Reading Time: 1 min 32 sec

Like any other social platform, OnlyFans has rules and restrictions that help guide content creation and posting. Your obligation as a content creator is to know and understand the type of content you’re allowed/not allowed to post. OnlyFans’ terms of use state the content allowed. But most creators rarely read through to the end to get more clarity. Most times, OnlyFans changes its restrictions and rules. An example is the August 2021 update on the adult content ban.

That’s why in this post, we’re going to explore all the Onlyfans restrictions regarding posting content on the site.

Make an appointment now

What Type of Content Can You Freely Post on OnlyFans?

First, you have to be verified as an adult above 18 years old to start posting content on OnlyFans. The content you can post on the platform includes-  

  • Videos and photos of yourself, fully clothed and in public
  • Videos and photos of yourself, in a bikini and lingerie, in a public place
  • Videos and photos of yourself with another verified OnlyFans creator, all clothed
  • Videos and photos of yourself naked but in a private place 
  • Videos and photos of yourself and another verified Onlyfans creator in private
  • Videos and photos of yourself naked in public. These should be captured when you are in Nature with no other people around.
  • Videos and photos of yourself with erotic toys
  • Videos and photos of yourself and another verified creator doing a physical activity
  • Audio messages that have no harassment or hate speech
  • Text posts with no hate speech or harassment
  • Videos and pictures of your body parts, either naked or clothed
  • Videos and photos containing bodily fluids like semen or saliva

This means you can film your body naked or clothed and post the pictures or videos on your OnlyFans page. You can also post anything clothed as long as the pictures are solo without other people.

As for the nudes you’ll be filming in public, they should be in a solitary place with no expectation of other people seeing you. It could be in a private and gated backyard or a garden. You are also permitted to shoot photos and videos with other creators as long as they’re verified by Onlyfans and have allowed you to post them.

Which Type of Content is Banned/Restricted on OnlyFans?

When it started, OnlyFans had a list of restrictions for posting. This is typical with most social media networks. As it started growing in popularity, the platform tightened its policies, including having non-verified people in your videos and photos.

Other reasons that caused the tightening of restrictions include the rules set up by Visa and Mastercard. These two have set high standards regarding the content allowed to sell through their medium. This only means that sites posting extreme porn content cannot use Visa or Mastercard to process their payments.

That’s why finding a medium to pay for extreme porn content online is not easy.

There are two categories of content restrictions imposed by OnlyFans. However strict these bans are, some of them actually help by preventing the exploitation of minors. They also allow you to stay within the law when using the platform.

7 Standard Restrictions on OnlyFans Content

The OnlyFans standard content restrictions are similar to those imposed by various social sites. They help to protect their users and prevent hate speech and violence. Its main objective is to maintain the best practices and help users to focus on their brand.

Restricted content under this category includes;

Discriminatory or Hateful Content – This is content that is offensive and directed to certain individuals or groups of people. It is targeted content directed at the identity, social status, or religion of the person/group. It could be hateful imagery or hate speech.

Fraudulent or Illegal Content – You cannot post anything considered illegal on OnlyFans. The platform also doesn’t allow you to post fraudulent content or someone else’s content and then cite it as your own.

Content related to Firearms – You are prohibited from uploading content about firearms and weapons. No imagery of knives, guns, or any other weapon.

Content that Harass or Threaten – OnlyFans is against posting imagery or texts that threaten another person. You can’t also post messages or visual content against another person.

Content Promoting Violence –The platform prohibits posting visual content with acts of violence or content that may promote violent acts against another person or group.

Content Containing Drugs – You cannot post videos or pictures of you or someone else smoking, holding a bong, or using drugs. Such content will be automatically removed from your page.

Suicidal or Self-Harming Content – You are prohibited from posting content that visualizes or mentions suicide or self-harm. Avoid writing posts that may encourage suicidal actions or thoughts.

Make an appointment now

Extreme Restrictions on OnlyFans Content

OnlyFans is not interested in extreme content, and Its terms of service are very clear about it. Anyone who features extreme content will be banned from the site. 

Types of extreme content restricted on OnlyFans include:

Revenge Porn – Revenge porn, according to OnlyFans, is any sexually explicit content featuring individuals without their consent. 

Violent Erotic Content – This includes posting content with all forms of violence, including sexual assault, rape, lack of consent, torture, sadomasochistic abuse, extreme fisting, or genital mutilation.

Banned Bodily Fluids –these are excrement-related, scatological, or urine materials.

Drugged Erotic Content – This involves intoxication and hypnosis

Illegal Erotic Content – Illegal erotic content includes bestiality, incest, and necrophilia

Illegal Erotic Services – These include prostitution, sex trafficking, and escort services

Non-Consensual Objectification and DeepFakes – You are not allowed to post degrading imagery or language without the consent of the individuals in your videos or pictures. DeepFakes are materials that are digitally edited to like a certain person without their consent.

How OnlyFans Protects Minors from Harm

OnlyFans’ goal is to protect underage individuals from accessing the site. The terms of use state that you shouldn’t use the platform in ways that may harm or exploit individuals under 18 years of age by exposing them to content that is inappropriate.

You cannot upload, display, or post content showing or referring to young people under 18 years, and you can’t mention juveniles anywhere in your posts. The platform is serious on this matter and will impose a ban if you violate it.

Why You’ll Get Banned on OnlyFans

While you’re creating content on your OnlyFans, you need to adhere to the rules to keep your account safe and make more money. Remember, OnlyFans’ safety measures and lines of conduct are very active. The rules governing allowed content can also change when you least expect it, causing your account to get banned.

Here are the reasons why OnlyFans accounts get banned.

  • Posting non-permitted content
  • Uploading violent, dangerous, or extreme content
  • Using promotional content that is not approved
  • Stalking or doxing
  • Posting someone else’s content
  • Hacked account
  • Using threatening or abusive behavior
  • Violent language or hate speech
  • Having disallowed activities when you’re not in control of your account
  • Inciting or promoting harm or self-harm in others
  • Disrespecting the end of contract wishes
  • Using unsolicited sexual posts
  • Revealing other user’s personal information
  • Criminal activity or deception
  • Trying to hack OnlyFans
  • Taking content outside the structure of OnlyFans
  • Trying to steal the OnlyFans brand
Make an appointment now

How to Recover Your Banned OnlyFans Account

The first thing to do when your OnlyFans account is banned is to appeal. You can contact the site’s support directly using these steps.

Email them at support@OnlyFans.com

In your email, include basic information like your name, address, contact information, a description of your issue or complaint, and the purpose of the complaint (Appeal Account Ban).

Give them time to respond.  

Sticking to the Rules on OnlyFans

Although it’s considered an adult content site, there are many niches you can delve into. OnlyFans has a broad category of content ideas to explore, and you can easily do it within the site’s rules. Here are some non-adult ideas for you.

  • Fitness and workouts
  • Art
  • Fashion
  • Travel
  • Musical instrument lessons
  • Photography
  • Beauty and makeup tutorials

Adult Content Ideas

  • Videos
  • Voice notes
  • Photos and photo set

The timeline of the type of content allowed on your OnlyFans will depend on whether your page is free or paid. Remember, all the full-frontal nudity content you upload should be behind the paywall. On your paid subscription page, you’re allowed to post explicit and adult content anywhere, including your locked DMs, normal DMs, locked posts, and on the timeline.

On your free page, you only post content that is partially nude on the timeline. But for the Pay Per View posts in the DMs or free page timeline, you can upload fully explicit and nude content. So if you’re wondering what and how to post on your OnlyFans, post free content on your free page. This should be teaser content without full-frontal nudity.

OnlyFans creates a distinction between promo content and premium content. Your promo content should be tame and shareable on social media. Make it sexy, teasing, and partial nudity. Make your explicit, premium content a bit exclusive and more explicit according to your personal boundaries. 

Take advantage of the PPV model to set up your subscription package and price your content. On OnlyFans, you can make money in various ways, including tips, private DMs, and more. These avenues will earn you extra cash. Your followers will need to pay a one-time fee or subscribe to view your content.

 The rule that cuts across OnlyFans creators and fans is that they must all be 18 years to create or consume content on the site. Anyone under 18 years is considered a minor whose rights are protected by the site.

Best Practices for Staying Within OnlyFans Restrictions

It can be disappointing to get suspended or banned by OnlyFans.  Here are the best practices to help you avoid this disappointment: 

  • Review OnlyFans content policies every three months to ensure your content is within the rules. 
  • Audit your past posts if they no longer comply with the restrictions
  • Manage your interactions with subscribers carefully
  • Don’t attempt to take OnlyFans content outside the platform tools
  • Respect other creators’ privacy
  • Don’t use OnlyFans for unintended purposes
  • Communicate with respect
  • Avoid using hate-fueled comments or content
  • Treat OnlyFans like you would any other profitable business
  • Don’t expose your or other creators’ personal information

Stay within OnlyFans Rules with Fandafia

Fandafia is an OnlyFans Agency that caters to your needs as a creator. They know how to get you the right content without violating any rules. 

With Fandafia, you are assured a position in the top 0.03% of creators. Its account management team utilizes the best strategies to make your page go viral, get more paying customers and make a profit.

Fandafia generates tailor-made strategies that appeal directly to prospects.

In Conclusion

Staying within the restrictions of OnlyFans is the best thing to do and ensure your success on the platform. This can only be achieved if you review the platform’s policies regularly. Observe the best practices to keep your account productive.

OnlyFans keeps growing and may constantly change and update its content rules. Always strive to keep your content within the rules. We created this guide to help you avoid getting banned because of going against the platform’s restrictions. 

Find out the type of content often banned by the platform just to be safe. If you mistakenly violate the rules, contact them immediately and notify them of your mistake. Consistent violations of policies can get you permanently banned on OnlyFans.
